title: Application of Reading Strategies and Improvement of Learning Outcomes in Automated Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital learning tools and reading comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Course cultivating reading strategy application skills in an interactive learning environment using an automated tutoring system, with analysis of learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can apply text analysis and summarization strategies with an accuracy of 80% or higher through interaction with an automated tutoring system.
Learners can identify and correct cognitive error patterns during the reading process three or more times based on system feedback.
Learners can compare strategy differences across low, medium, and high reading proficiency groups and design personalized strategies tailored to their own level.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
